name: system-jobs-setup
description: Automatically set up and verify all system jobs in the database. Use when adding new cron jobs or after database reset.
author: Real Rise Agency
capabilities: Verify all cron jobs exist in systemJobs table
Check job health and last run status
when_to_use: After deploying new cron jobs to convex/crons.ts
When system jobs show 'never run' or 'paused'
To verify all jobs are properly configured
example_usage:
User: 'The AI Proxy Orchestrator shows paused, can you fix it?'
Assistant: I'll use the system-jobs-setup skill to verify and configure all system jobs.
